ValidationRule.description: To make sure user fill the Other McAfee product , when the Other Product Not Listed value is chosen in the McAfee Product field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'McAfee', ISPICKVAL( McAfee_Product__c , 'Other Product Not Listed'), Other_McAfee_product__c = '' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Other McAfee Product Name or MFG PN#
